question: Alex and Andrea have 104 minutes to walk to the bank together. It takes them 7 minutes to get to the corner where the school is. It takes them another 14 minutes to get to the cinema. How much longer do they have to get to bank without being late?
answer:
Alex and Andrea arrive at the school with 104 - 7 = <<104-7=97>>97 minutes left to reach the cinema.
They then arrive at the cinema and have 97 - 14 = <<97-14=83>>83 minutes left to get to bank without being late.
#### 83
